code: import axios from'axios';var getCharacteristics=function getCharacteristics(product_id){return axios.get("/meta",{baseURL:'http://127.0.0.1:3004/reviews',params:{product_id:product_id}}).then(function(res){return res.data.characteristics;}).catch(function(err){console.log(err,'error getting reviews characteristics for the product id');});};export default getCharacteristics;
